column1: #Text=> [**I²EBench: A Comprehensive Benchmark for Instruction-based Image Editing**](https://arxiv.org/abs/2408.14180)  \r
#Text=> Yiwei Ma, Jiayi Ji, Ke Ye, Weihuang Lin, Zhibin Wang, Yonghan Zheng, Qiang Zhou, Xiaoshuai Sun, Rongrong Ji\r
#Text=Overview of **I²EBench**, an automated system for evaluating the quality of editing results generated by instruction-based image editing (IIE) models.
#Text=We collected a dataset of over 2000+ images from public datasets and annotated them with corresponding original editing instructions.
#Text=To diversify the instructions, we used ChatGPT to generate varied versions.
#Text=With the collected images and the original/diverse editing instructions, we utilized existing IIE models to generate edited images.
#Text=Subsequently, we developed an evaluation methodology to automatically assess the adherence of edited images to the provided instructions under different dimensions.
#Text=We also implemented human evaluation to obtain human preferences for editing results of different IIE models.
#Text=Finally, we analyzed the correlation between automated evaluation and human evaluation, confirming alignment with human perception.\r
#Text=+ Comparison of radar charts for I²EBench scores in different dimensions using (a) original instructions and (b) diverse instructions.\r
#Text=+ Comparison of radar charts for I²EBench scores in different categories using (a) original instructions and (b) diverse instructions.
#Text=The scores of all dimensions are normalized and averaged.\r
